board

Class Square

  • java.lang.Object
    • board.Square
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicSquare, BottomStairway, HorsePen, StairwaySquare

    public abstract class Square
extends java.lang.Object
    Square is the class representing a Square in a board game.
    Author:
    edouard
